urls.title: FlyPink: Condor donates 11,000 Euros to German Cancer Aid and raises awareness in Breast Cancer Awareness Month October
urls.description: Thomas Cook Group Airline in Great Britain, Scandinavia and Germany hands over around 71,000 Euros to three cancer organisations

data.text: #FlyPink: Condor donates 11,000 Euros to German Cancer Aid: https://t.co/qSIezWOIJf https://t.co/yobd9Kh3rO

data.text: Spectacular #winter #holidays in #Europe are waiting – Fly with #Condor from #Seattle and #LasVegas to #Frankfurt #Germany to visit the beautiful #ChristmasMarket or with #ThomasCookAirlinesUK from #NewYork to #Manchester #xmas🎅💛 https://t.co/ocFRT4eZSn https://t.co/USgCvUJt20

#ThomasCookGroupAirlines flew #pink and successfully supported #breast
#cancer #research https://t.co/rBysoDQWCV - #FlyPink #initiative #sunnyheart 💛#condorairline #pink
#Condor wishes #farewell @airberlin. #Thanks for 39 years of #aviation #history and a great #partnership https://t.co/zhD4Wk4zJi
#Condor and the #ThomasCook airline family have received more than 60 awards in recent time #ThomasCookGroupAirlines https://t.co/Om6uUNlGRK

data.text: Happy to be flying to and from New Orleans. #Boeing767 See our inaugural flight celebrations @NO_Airport  https://t.co/Pl3OxHLUkl
RT @AlaskaAir: Welcome our newest Mileage Plan global partner @Condor_America! https://t.co/vdrH7EXHjJ #iFlyAlaska #ExploretheWorld https:/…
Eyes closed or all ears? How do you spend a long flight? https://t.co/tZjw5WbQYE
We've even re-introduced row 13 - in 2013 of all years! #friday13th #avgeek https://t.co/YCKyP1UqU8
Merry Christmas! <3 https://t.co/Pt6k3Y9Dfw
Have a nice #weekend y'all! https://t.co/Ct2udWkd6q
Are you traveling over the Holidays and you can’t leave without your favorite Christmas Tree? No problem! https://t.co/hiCuspw78F https://t.co/6Ob4O2JxqW
Our on-board Advent calendar. ;-) https://t.co/QpGTgDgKxi

@mjr_1985 der neue Abflug ist um 22:10 h am 02.12.16.
@arno2807 Voraussichtliche Abflugzeit 02.12.16 Ortszeit 22.10 Uhr. Weitere Infos müssen am Flughafen eingeholt werden.
@umwelthauptstdt Hallo, vielen Dank für diesen Bericht!

End of November check list, please. https://t.co/lAiLQ3ndXv
Have a nice week! <3 https://t.co/sn5Ssvb9mt

We established radar contact with the weekend. Only five days to go. Happy Monday! https://t.co/g1BOOoRfoH

Attention jet-setters! Starting next summer, you can fly from Pittsburg to 
Frankfurt, Germany: https://t.co/u1A2EyTZXL

New next summer! Nonstop service from @PITairport to @Airport_FRA and beyond! https://t.co/W1wsO31f8I
Happy Halloween! https://t.co/5sNboDJ4sx

data.text: Condor is working hard to accommodate all guests in local hotels until they can travel onward to their destination 2/3
